name: Grave Problems
description:
This game was created for Kenney Jam 2022 in 15 hours. 

Controls: WASD or arrow keys. 

Bugs
You can't destroy Graves with your knife, made a sloppy mistake with the SFX. Bug fixed in this post JAM version https://prettyflygames.itch.io/grave-problems-post-jam-version.
